Case Title: Subodh Kumar Singh Rathour  Vs The Chief Executive Officer & Ors.
Issue for Consideration: Issue for Consideration Scope of judicial review of the actions of the State in the matters relating to contract/tender disputes under writ jurisdiction; whether the action on the part of the respondent in cancelling the tender was amenable to the High Court; if so, whether the said action could be termed as arbitrary or unfair and in consequence of violation of Article 14 of the Constitution of India.
